üìú About Me

Hello My name is Joseph Kennedy Duncan Mogavero Born on Febuary 27 1997. my whole life I have been fascinated by technology and learning how things work. When I was a young growing up I had dial up internet which was very slow so my parents would take my older brother, younger sister and I to the public library where they had highspeed internet. I grew up playing video games like Minecraft, it was not long before I started Modifying the gamefiles to make the game more enjoyable by downloading modified texture to enhance the looks of games to adding additional textures and assets in game to add unique items to the game, this got me interested in videogame developement at a younge age i went on to join the video game coding/programing club at Westwood Middle school which I attended from grades 6 threw 8. highschool I attended East York Collegate Institute where I primarely enjoyed gym class, Tech class, and Math class. when I was in grade 11 I took a CO-OP as a electrician where I accumulated 665 hours Apprenticing/working under a Master Electrician. I learned the fundamentals of ellectrical systems and applications including industrial, commercial as well as residential ellectrical systems. The next year Gr.12 I took computer engineering in this course I learned all of the parts of a computer system how to take apart and rebuild a desktop computer and install operating systems. i also learned about coding/computer languages like Binary, macine code and
